name: Mountains Haggadah
description:
The Haggadah is the typical jewish tale format. The most famous one is the Pesach Haggadah (read during Passover) that tells the story of the jewish people exodus form Egypt. 

Mountains Haggadah is a single-player adventure game where the protagonist has to experience interact and explore, running for his life.

 Who he is? Who's chasing him?  Why?

--Since this is my first 3D game any feedback is crucial and welcome: send an e-mail to rbn.gandus@gmail.com--
